title: Fort Davis National Historic Site: Donate
body: Donate       How to Donate: Send donations directly to:       Fort Davis National Historic Site    PO Box 1379   Fort Davis, Texas 79734 OR The Friends of Fort Davis National Historic Site P.O. Box 1023 Fort Davis, Texas 79734 https://www.facebook.com/fofdnhs?ref=profile The Friends of Fort Davis National Historic Site is a nonprofit organization which exists to support activities approved by the National Park Service for which congressionally appropriated funds are not available. The group provides money for such activities as historic preservation and restoration, education and cultural programs, research and planning.
